data.Name: Kyle Smith
data.Bio: Kyle Smith (born 1985) is a singer-songwriter and guitarist from Albany, New York. He has been compared to Brett Dennen, Jack Johnson, and Conor Oberst. In 2009, Kyle began a new project, My Knowing Smile. Kyle Smith's new CD with My Knowing Smile, features Heidi Zacharias (harmony, piano). " Hymn and Him" was released in April, 2009. In 2007, Kyle recorded his first studio album, "Beto's Quest for Knowledge." The album showed Kyle's range, from Read more on Last.fm
